meanings.definition: A print made from a photograph
meanings.sent1: I bought a beautiful photogravure of a sunset for my living room.
meanings.sent2: The art gallery displayed various photogravures of famous landmarks.
meanings.sent3: My friend tried to pass off a photogravure of a cat as a real photo!
meanings.sent4: The photogravures in the exhibition captured the essence of nature perfectly.
meanings.sent5: The photogravure of the old lighthouse was so detailed, it felt like I could step into it.

meanings.definition: The process of making such prints
meanings.sent1: The artist explained the intricate steps involved in creating photogravures.
meanings.sent2: Photogravures require skill and precision to produce high-quality prints.
meanings.sent3: During the workshop, we tried our hand at photogravures with mixed results.
meanings.sent4: The photogravure process transforms a simple photo into a work of art.
meanings.sent5: Watching the master at work, I was amazed by the magic of photogravures.
